description: Try our easy to follow Stuffed Tofu recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Stuffed Tofu Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add tofu and yeast flakes to a food processor and process until smooth. Season with salt. Shape into an 8x30cm log and wrap tightly in plastic. Refrigerate while making the stuffing.

Heat oil in a medium saucepan over medium heat. Add onion, garlic, bay leaf and thyme and cook for 3-5 minutes, stirring often, or until softened. Add mushroom and cook for a further 5 minutes or until mixture is thick and liquid has evaporated. Stir through parsley and season. Set aside to cool completely.
To make the glaze, combine all the ingredients in a small pan over medium heat and cook for 3-5 minutes or until sugar dissolves and mixture is syrupy. Set aside.
Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.
Unwrap log and transfer to tray. Use a spoon to carefully remove centre of log, leaving a 3cm shell. Carefully fill with half the mushroom mixture. Replace tofu to seal log, pressing firmly to join.
Add lemons to tray with tofu. Bake for 45 minutes, brushing well with glaze every 15 minutes.

Meanwhile, to make the gravy, place remaining mushroom mixture in a small pan. Mix cornflour with 1/4 cup stock in a small bowl until smooth and stir into pan. Add remaining stock and whisk over medium heat for 5-10 minutes or until thickened. Season. Slice log and serve with gravy, lemon and cos.
